ComicInfo.Title: Beaujack; Ridiculous Renting Spaces; When the World Runs Out of Food; A Cracked Look at Prizefighting; Nostalgic Amusement Parks; A Cracked Look at a Zoo; Chariots of the Clods?; Cracked Methods of Staying Thin Forever; Papion; Cracked Interviews the Garbage King; The Fuel Crisis; Desert Creatures Beware!; Do You Want to Play a Game?; Shut-Ups!; Otis O. Pratt Perfects First Successful Hearing Aid!!!
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.A satire of the television show Kojak.
New places where we might start seeing advertising.
Ways to solve the potential world food shortage.
A look at some potential new parks - Prohibitionland, Depressionland and Rock-Around-The-Clock-Land.
A satire of the movie PAPILLON.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:45:00. [Issue ID 250483]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,Su Gumen,Don Orehek,John Severin,Murray Ball
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,Su Gumen,Don Orehek,John Severin,Murray Ball
